function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High population density","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation and air circulation, reduced crowding","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, occupancy monitoring","People":"Residents, workers","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Frequent movements","Impact":"Potential for disease spread through movement","Mitigation":"Enhanced sanitation, reduced contact points","Technologies":"Sanitization stations, touchless technology","People":"Travelers, commuters","Owner":"Transportation authorities, employers"}]}
